titleStmt.title: A funeral-sermon upon occasion of the death of Mrs. Lobb late wife of Mr. Stephen Lobb. Preached by Samuel Slater, minister of the Gospel
titleStmt.author: Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, and Tho. Cockerill, at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside, and at the Three Legs in the Poultrey,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
